about.p1: Healthy Bite is an ecosystem created to help you make your eating mindful, tasty, and truly healthy.
about.p2: We combine technology, care, and motivation so that your path to better health is simple and enjoyable.
about.quote: Healthy eating is not a diet, it is a way of life.

hero.title: Healthy Bite: mindful eating without extremes
hero.subtitle: We help you build a way of eating you can actually live with - not just survive for two weeks on a diet.

how.title: How Healthy Bite works
how.intro: Instead of strict rules and "perfect" diets, Healthy Bite helps you change your eating habits step by step - in a way that actually fits your real life.

schedules.title: Built for real schedules
schedules.p1: We combine gentle weekly goals with supportive check-ins so you can see steady progress without rigid plans.
schedules.p2: The assistant adapts if you travel, work late, or cook for family — keeping momentum without pressure.

checkin.title: 1. Quick check-in
checkin.text: You answer a few questions about your day, energy, sleep and meals - no calorie spreadsheets.

plan.title: 2. Simple plan for the week
plan.text: The AI suggests 1-2 realistic changes for the next days: portions, snacks, water, timing.

track.title: 3. Gentle tracking, not control
track.text: You mark how your week went, what was easy and what was hard - without guilt for "slips".

adapt.title: 4. Adapting to your real life
adapt.text: The assistant adjusts recommendations to your schedule, preferences and mood, so changes stay with you long-term.

story.title: Why we created Healthy Bite
story.p1: We were tired of diets that work only in before/after photos, but not in real life. Strict bans, guilt after every "mistake" and the feeling that food controls you - not the other way around.
story.p2: Healthy Bite grew out of a simple idea: small realistic changes plus a smart assistant that helps you stay consistent. Without toxic fitness culture, magic detoxes or rigid lists of "forbidden" foods.
story.p3: Our goal is not to turn your life into endless calorie counting. We want you to understand your own patterns and build a way of eating that supports your energy, mood and health for years.

balance.title: No extremes
balance.text: No crash diets, starvation plans or perfect eating rules. We focus on sustainable, flexible habits that fit your real life.

steps.title: Small steps
steps.text: Each week you adjust only one or two things: portions, snacks, water, sleep. The goal is steady progress, not rigid perfection.

data.title: Data over myths
data.text: We rely on questions, check-ins and science-based guidelines - not random tips from social media or miracle products.

support.title: Support, not pressure
support.text: We do not punish you for "slips". We help understand what happened and how to return to your routine gently.

items.beginners: People who are just starting to think about nutrition and do not know where to begin.
items.busy: Busy people who want structure without spending hours cooking and tracking every detail.
items.tried: Those who have already tried many diets but cannot keep the result for long.
items.feel_better: Anyone who wants to feel lighter and more energetic, without chasing a perfect body image.

product.title: Product & engineering
product.text: We build Healthy Bite as a tool we would use ourselves: clear UI, minimal friction and practical recommendations instead of complex settings.

nutrition.title: Nutrition & practice
nutrition.text: We consult with practitioners so that AI suggestions align with real-world nutrition practice and can be adapted to different lifestyles.

cta.title: Ready to start without strict diets?
cta.text: Answer a few questions and the AI assistant will suggest simple first steps and a rough structure for your meals based on your preferences.

faq.title: Contact FAQ
faq.lead: Quick answers to the most common things people ask before reaching out.

1.question: How fast do you usually reply?
1.answer: Most messages receive an answer within 24 hours on business days.

2.question: Can I get medical advice here?
2.answer: No. We do not diagnose or replace medical care. We can help you prepare questions for your doctor or think through habits.

3.question: Do you offer meal plans for families?
3.answer: Yes, we can discuss flexible structures that work for shared meals and different appetites.

4.question: Can I cancel or reschedule a consultation?
4.answer: Yes, just reply to our email or use the link inside the confirmation message.

5.question: Do you store my messages forever?
5.answer: We keep only what we need to support you and improve the service, and you can ask us to delete your data.
